achievements: Built and integrated 5+ dynamic tables with sorting, filtering, and pagination using Next.js, TypeScript, and API endpoints‚Äîenhancing data accessibility for 1500+ active users.
Implemented Excel bulk upload with live table previews; optimized server performance by 40% using debouncing and delayed execution on high-frequency functions.
Enhanced UI with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, and Framer Motion for smooth transitions‚Äîboosting user engagement and daily activity by 25%.
Enabled multilingual support using 'next-i18next', improving accessibility for 3,000+ users and boosting retention by 20%.
Built a responsive leaderboard from scratch using Next.js, MUI, Tailwind CSS, and TanStack Query; integrated RESTful APIs and reduced load time by 30%.
Implemented debounced API calls and reusable components using JavaScript, improving responsiveness and cutting frontend development time by 40%.
